Title: Establishes the New York state advisory council on coronavirus economic recovery and workforce development
Summary: Establishes the New York state advisory council on coronavirus economic recovery and workforce development which will work to promote economic development and collaboration opportunities.
LawCode: Add Art 23 ยง455, Ec Dev L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law, in relation to establishing the New York state advisory council on coronavirus economic recovery and workforce development; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
